climbs.name: Jan Conn Route
climbs.fa: Jan Conn belayed by Herb Conn

content.description: Start on the backside pretty easy to find. Easy climb with a tiny summit. On the first ascent Herb was too shy with the tourists around so he belayed Jan. Once ontop Jan let out a "Yodel!" for the tourists. Easy fun Conn route good warm up to the area and beginner climber.
content.protection: Rope and creativity Needles style Rap gets you back to Earth.
content.location: Seen from Needles eye parking lot

content.description: Twin spires are the spires that can be seen close to the needles eye parking lot. When facing Hitching post these are the obvious 2 spires to the right that resemble sharks teeth.  The down hill of the two is a little taller Conn route on backside.
